Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    This class allows creation of Card objects using various constructors and gives Card objects methods
    Author:
    Jack Ambery

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card()
        Default constructor sets Card to ace of clubs. This is the first card in a sorted deck.
